headline.main: Attack Is Urged on Causes of Cancer

docs.abstract: cancer expert Dr Irving J Selikoff says 1 of every 5 deaths among asbestos workers is caused by lung cancer, although statistic might be as much result of smoking as of inhaling asbestos dust, conf sponsored by Rutgers Univ Med and Dentistry Coll (S)

byline.original: By RUDY JOHNSON Special to The New York Times

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLE
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: PISCATAWAY, Nov. 16 Dr. Irving J. Selikoff, an expert on cancer in the environment appealed today for curbs on cancer-causing conditions.
docs.snippet: PISCATAWAY, Nov. 16 Dr. Irving J. Selikoff, an expert on cancer in the environment appealed today for curbs on cancer-causing conditions.
